page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock.Next I get myself ready and have my breakfast which is usually cornflakes and toast.Sometimes I watch breakfast television but not often.I walk to school and get there about 8-45 and meet my friends who come on the minbus. We come in,and have assembly in the hall where we sing a hymn and listen to a story or bit from the Bible from Mr Davison. Next we have English until break where we might do reading, spelling,writing or other language work.Then we do Maths which I like,.We do many interesting topics and use the BBC computer.Then comes dinner.My best is beefburger beans and chips.I play football till in time then we do a project on history,science,or another country.This I like a lot.After we have a story,do music,or games outside
